title: Attn Photoshop all-stars
author: VD
content_html: It’s sexier than the iPad. Or rather, it’s much more useful than the iPad. It’s the first pass at the default Adobe Photoshop CS4 mode. Of course, we don’t use Photoshop to any great extent, so any suggestions from experienced Photoshop users for material improvements to the present commands assigned to the default Photoshop CS4 mode would be very much appreciated.
content_text:
It’s sexier than the iPad.  Or rather, it’s much more useful than the iPad.  It’s the first pass at
the default Adobe Photoshop CS4 mode
.  Of course, we don’t use Photoshop to any great extent, so any suggestions from experienced Photoshop users for material improvements to the present commands assigned to the default Photoshop CS4 mode would be very much appreciated.
